Sentencas: Bimetallic Ni/Pd anodic catalysts are synthesized for application in direct methanol solid oxide fuel cells (DMSOFCs).
Titulo: Coke-Free Oxidation of Methanol in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Heterogeneous Nickel-Palladium Catalysts Prepared by Atomic Layer Deposition

Sentencas: Pd nanoparticles are deposited on the surface of porous Ni, prepared by sputtering, via atomic layer deposition (ALD).
Titulo: Coke-Free Oxidation of Methanol in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Heterogeneous Nickel-Palladium Catalysts Prepared by Atomic Layer Deposition

Sentencas: The amount of ALD Pd is optimized by varying the number of ALD cycles (150, 300, and 600 cycles).
Titulo: Coke-Free Oxidation of Methanol in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Heterogeneous Nickel-Palladium Catalysts Prepared by Atomic Layer Deposition

Sentencas: The power output of fuel cells employing the ceramic electrolyte-support pellets is enhanced by 3-6 times with optimal ALD Pd treatment compared to that of the cell with a bare Ni anode.
Titulo: Coke-Free Oxidation of Methanol in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Heterogeneous Nickel-Palladium Catalysts Prepared by Atomic Layer Deposition

Sentencas: The anode kinetics and stability against carbon coking are significantly improved by the ALD Pd surface treatment.
Titulo: Coke-Free Oxidation of Methanol in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Heterogeneous Nickel-Palladium Catalysts Prepared by Atomic Layer Deposition

Sentencas: The surface of the anode with ALD Pd remains clean after a fuel cell test with methanol, whilst severe growth of carbon fibers is observed on the bare Ni surface.
Titulo: Coke-Free Oxidation of Methanol in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Heterogeneous Nickel-Palladium Catalysts Prepared by Atomic Layer Deposition

Sentencas: The ALD Pd cell exhibits superior long-term stability compared to the bare Ni anode.
Titulo: Coke-Free Oxidation of Methanol in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Heterogeneous Nickel-Palladium Catalysts Prepared by Atomic Layer Deposition
